title: Hide-and-Seek Box Signature Blend 75% Dark Chocolate & Madagascar 45% Milk Chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Inside this playful and elegant box, you'll find eight hexa-birds to slip each into their packet (using the supplied pair of gloves) before hiding them inside or outside for an unforgettable Easter Flight. Ducks, geese, woodpeckers and peacocks in dark, milk and mendiant chocolate fly away: it's up to you to find them ! And don’t forget, the early bird catches the worm, so hurry!

description: From their heavenly home, our birds have the most beautiful sea view, and are able to watch over one of our Easter must-haves. And yes, in the midst of all these feathers, our eight sardines with delicately faceted scales have taken the Manufacture's gourmet bait. In dark and milk chocolate, nicely lined up in their tin (or rather cardboard box) designed by Soins Graphiques, they're meant to be offered as gifts and to please every sweet tooth!

title: Peacock Chocolate Box Signature Blend 75% Dark Chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Featuring on one of our most splendid creations, the king of birds leads the way in our Easter Flight! This year, our Chocolate Box showcases a majestic peacock whose feather headdress shelters a real praliné treasure. A playful & impressive creation: equipped with cotton gloves, it's up to you to put together the Signature Blend 75% dark chocolate base and lid, without forgetting to hide the coconut praliné bells and hazelnut & caramel praliné pépites inside! Open, take a bite, close, spread your wings and take another bite!
